text: <@U1T95QCUE>, currently you cannot dynamically add a node to a pbft network.  There's ongoing discussion on this topic in the architecture wg so do join
also,  folks working on consensus use the <#C0Z4NBUN6|fabric-consensus-dev>  channel rather than this one.
Actually I'm working on this scalable consensus node, but with current PBFT, we are stuck on this. BTW, thanks <@U0UGH3X7X> , I'm going to join the channel.
